Based on user preference cues, I would recommend "The Deer Hunter" and "American Gangster". 

"The Deer Hunter" is a classic war movie that tells the story of two friends in World War II who are assigned to protect Navajo Marines, who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

"American Gangster" is based on the real-life story of Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.
